entries.s_ffdc10ae: The guy I'm looking for stole some equipment. Nobody got a good look at him, but the crate that he stole had a transponder signal attached to it.
entries.s_fc5b59e0: That's great! Just point out who you think it is. If your reasoning is justified, I'll take care of the rest.
entries.s_faaf7075: Did you find out who my mark is?
entries.s_df981c5e: I thought you were tracking him for a long time?
entries.s_df879e: No time to talk now, sorry.
entries.s_dec94c0f: I've got no time for 'kinda familiar'. I need concrete information.
entries.s_dce437b6: Have you questioned all the smugglers here?
entries.s_d9ec1dc4: 'Arrest him'... heh. Yea, I would 'arrest him' but the problem is, I don't know which one of these smugglers he is.
entries.s_d3412303: What seems to be the problem?
entries.s_cd33dbbc: OK. If you find out who it is, let me know.
entries.s_bebac1d7: You must think I'm stupid don't you? A little while after I tracked the signal to this city, it went dead. He must have found it and turned it off.
entries.s_bd2c41cb: You there. Do you know any of these smugglers here?
entries.s_b932a57a: Hey there! Thanks again for helping me find the right mark. You're OK in my book.
entries.s_b8f4813d: Well, that one guy does look kinda familiar.
entries.s_b8bf2aa9: Yea, that's the thing. I don't know which one of these smugglers is my mark.
entries.s_a49ad86c: I don't know, but good luck!
entries.s_922dd166: Then why don't you arrest him?
entries.s_86c02324: A lotta help you were. Get out of here.
entries.s_806d4263: Questioned them? Yep, I found all the suspected smugglers in the area and brought them here. Questioned them, pushed them around, roughed them up, you name it.
entries.s_7eb6abbe: I figured as much. Blast it all. Now what do I do?
entries.s_7cf16bce: Sounds like you have it under control.
entries.s_775eed34: No, can't say as I do.
entries.s_659bb141: Listen up, kid. This stuff isn't as easy as it sounds. Cut me some slack.
entries.s_624a9b6f: Yea, yea. Get out of here.
entries.s_60d63ec8: No, I didn't think that you would. Curses. Now what do I do?
entries.s_5e244342: I've helped all I can. Good-bye.
entries.s_54e633f8: Then leave me alone. I'm busy.
entries.s_44f4df: You really do think I'm stupid. I can handle this myself... but, uh... if you want to, give it a shot. See what you can find out.
entries.s_402e3e9a: Wow, I wouldn't want to be in your position.
entries.s_3ece0ca2: You've got to be the worst bounty hunter ever.
entries.s_3769e5f8: I don't have time to talk right now. Sorry.
entries.s_369a8bff: Maybe I can find out who your mark is.
entries.s_29ecd548: You had your shot, kid. I'm not going to give you another chance. Get out of here.
entries.s_254a92c6: To be honest, I'm a little confused. I know the smuggler captain and I can trust him. But everyone else just blames each other, and I don't know what to do.
entries.s_250df636: One of these smugglers is my mark. I think. I'm not sure.  I've been tracking him for some time and just now caught up with him here in this city.
entries.s_239b0909: Well, I hope you find him. Good-bye!
entries.s_1fa16fd3: Then why not find the one with the transponder?
entries.s_1b0651f8: Yes, I think I know who it is.
entries.s_12afde00: Smugglers? Why would I know any smugglers?
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (quest_hero_of_tatooine_bounty_hunter.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
